# Users API

Complete API reference for managing users. All endpoints support full CRUD operations.

## User Model

```json
{
  "id": string,             # Serial primary key auto-generated
  "name": string,           # User's name (max 255 characters)
  "email": string,          # User's email (max 255 characters, must be unique)
  "createdAt": string,      # ISO 8601 timestamp (auto-generated)
  "updatedAt": string       # ISO 8601 timestamp (auto-updated)
}
```

## List Users

### `GET /api/users`

Returns a list of all users. Supports pagination.

**Query Parameters:**

- `page` (optional) - Page number (default: 1)
- `limit` (optional) - Items per page (default: 10)

**Response:** `200 OK`

**Without pagination:**

```json
[
  {
    "id": "1",
    "name": "John Doe",
    "email": "john@example.com",
    "createdAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00.000Z",
    "updatedAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00.000Z"
  },
  {
    "id": "2",
    "name": "Jane Smith",
    "email": "jane@example.com",
    "createdAt": "2024-01-02T00:00:00.000Z",
    "updatedAt": "2024-01-02T00:00:00.000Z"
  }
]
```

**With pagination:**

```json
{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": "1",
      "name": "John Doe",
      "email": "john@example.com",
      "createdAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00.000Z",
      "updatedAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00.000Z"
    }
  ],
  "pagination": {
    "total": 50,
    "page": 1,
    "limit": 10,
    "totalPages": 5
  }
}
```

**Example Request:**

```bash
curl -X GET "https://mock-api-ten-eosin.vercel.app/api/users?page=1&limit=10"
```

## Get User by ID

### `GET /api/users/:id`

Returns a specific user by their ID.

**Path Parameters:**

- `id` (required) - User ID

**Response:** `200 OK`

```json
{
  "id": "1",
  "name": "John Doe",
  "email": "john@example.com",
  "createdAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00.000Z",
  "updatedAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00.000Z"
}
```

**Error Response:** `404 Not Found`

```json
{
  "error": "User not found"
}
```

**Example Request:**

```bash
curl -X GET "https://mock-api-ten-eosin.vercel.app/api/users/1"
```

## Create User

### `POST /api/users`

Creates a new user.

**Request Body:**

```json
{
  "name": "John Doe",
  "email": "john@example.com"
}
```

**Request Headers:**

```
Content-Type: application/json
```

**Response:** `201 Created`

```json
{
  "id": "1",
  "name": "John Doe",
  "email": "john@example.com",
  "createdAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00.000Z",
  "updatedAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00.000Z"
}
```

**Error Response:** `400 Bad Request`

```json
{
  "error": "Email already exists"
}
```

**Example Request:**

```bash
curl -X POST "https://mock-api-ten-eosin.vercel.app/api/users" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "name": "John Doe",
    "email": "john@example.com"
  }'
```

## Update User

### `PUT /api/users/:id`

Updates an existing user by ID.

**Path Parameters:**

- `id` (required) - User ID

**Request Body:**

```json
{
  "name": "John Updated",
  "email": "john.updated@example.com"
}
```

**Request Headers:**

```
Content-Type: application/json
```

**Response:** `200 OK`

```json
{
  "id": "1",
  "name": "John Updated",
  "email": "john.updated@example.com",
  "createdAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00.000Z",
  "updatedAt": "2024-01-15T00:00:00.000Z"
}
```

**Error Responses:**

`404 Not Found`:

```json
{
  "error": "User not found"
}
```

`400 Bad Request`:

```json
{
  "error": "Email already exists"
}
```

**Example Request:**

```bash
curl -X PUT "https://mock-api-ten-eosin.vercel.app/api/users/1" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "name": "John Updated",
    "email": "john.updated@example.com"
  }'
```

## Delete User

### `DELETE /api/users/:id`

Deletes a user by ID.

**Path Parameters:**

- `id` (required) - User ID

**Response:** `200 OK`

```json
{
  "message": "User deleted successfully",
  "user": {
    "id": "1",
    "name": "John Doe",
    "email": "john@example.com",
    "createdAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00.000Z",
    "updatedAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00.000Z"
  }
}
```

**Error Response:** `404 Not Found`

```json
{
  "error": "User not found"
}
```

**Example Request:**

```bash
curl -X DELETE "https://mock-api-ten-eosin.vercel.app/api/users/1"
```

## Validation Rules

- **name**: Required, string, max 255 characters
- **email**: Required, string, max 255 characters, must be unique, valid email format

## Error Codes

| Status Code | Description                                     |
| ----------- | ----------------------------------------------- |
| `200`       | Success                                         |
| `201`       | User created successfully                       |
| `400`       | Bad request (validation error, duplicate email) |
| `404`       | User not found                                  |
| `500`       | Internal server error                           |
